name: Around The Block (Hussain, kujakaja)
description:
Hi there

We are Bug Bytes - a team of two, one programmer hoping to squish the bugs he finds, and one entomologist who would never even think of doing such a thing. W jazz it out once a year and jam it out with GMTK, we hope you enjoy our game, let us know what you think!

How To Play

Place buildings on the tiles to build up your town. Beware - different building types interact with other building types in specific ways, affecting the total point score! Oh, and you don't always get a say in what building type is being placed next, that's up to the luck of the draw, or, well, the roll of the dice. Have fun!

Useful Tips

  • Don't worry - the cube won't move straight off the bat... you'll see!
  • Pressing quit brings you back to the start screen, and acts as a reset button
  • There is unfortunately no game over screen - sorry - try and beat your highest score
  • Click the die to roll it
  • Click the 'build' button to expand it into a build menu
  • There are indicators to the right when you are placing a building that will show you how this building type will interact with the others within the 9 squares surrounding it
  • Interactions occur in every direct, yes, every direction - also 3D!
